thread.title: How To Proceed In A Post-Kristen-Stewart-Saying-She-Is-Sooo-Gay World
thread.title_full: How To Proceed In A Post-Kristen-Stewart-Saying-She-Is-Sooo-Gay World

author: Lauren Yapalater
title: How To Proceed In A Post-Kristen-Stewart-Saying-She-Is-Sooo-Gay World
text:
View this image ›
NBC / Via tumblr.refinery29.com ID: 10476289 3. I mean, if you are (as I suspected from the start) a queer woman heavily invested in the personal life of Kristen Stewart, then I mean, you knew. View this image ›
Trickyd / TrickyD/Osvaldo/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10476516 4. You really knew , cause she like, kinda talked about it. View this image ›
Bruce / Bruce/Javiles/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10476539 5. So, this wasn’t exactly a *surprise*. ID: 10476540 6. And yet, hearing those five words come out of her mouth on the SNL stage shook you to your core. NBC / Via agentscullycarter.tumblr.com
NBC / Via agentscullycarter.tumblr.com
 ID: 10476299 7. And now, we are living in a post-Kristen-Stewart-saying-she-is-sooo-gay world. So how shall we proceed? Well. I’ll tell you. ID: 10476550 8. STAY CALM. Kristen Stewart on SNL: "I'm so gay dude" Me:
— The Dreaded Laramie (@Ham_Solo666) ID: 10476421 9. Try to remember that you’re cool, everything is cool and that feeling in your stomach is actually just intense joy. Kristen Stewart: I'm like so gay, dude! My entire tl:
— cuntnugget (@Queeranoia) ID: 10476422 10. But also - don’t forget to remind everyone around you at all times that THIS IS FUCKING AMAZING. I imagine Patriots fans felt almost as happy as I did on Saturday night when #kristenstewart said she was "so gay" on SNL
— Lauren S (@laurenskee) ID: 10476424 11. YES, SHE IS SOO GAY, DUDE. View this image ›
Jamie Mccarthy / Getty Images ID: 10476484 12. Let it sink it. Revel in it. View this image ›
Nicholas Hunt ID: 10476485 13. Also, text all your friends and family! This is momentous! View this image ›
infinity-on-dru.tumblr.com ID: 10476593 14. Additionally, we now have been blessed with quite literally the perfect gif for any occasion. ID: 10476631 15. Someone emailing you too much? Send them this gif. Who even cares if it applies or not! View this image ›
NBC / Via tumblr.refinery29.com ID: 10476602 16. Grandma asking too many questions about your love life at Christmas dinner? Show her this image: View this image ›
NBC / Via tumblr.refinery29.com ID: 10476613 17. Want to say literally anything at any time to express yourself? JUST POST THIS EVERYWHERE AND ANYWHERE. View this image ›
NBC / Via tumblr.refinery29.com ID: 10476625 18. Print it out! Hang it on your wall! Do whatever! ID: 10476638 19. Also, feel free to use the words of Kristen Stewart on SNL to get you through hard times. when i find myself in times of trouble kristen stewart comes to me, speaking words of wisdom: "i'm like so gay, dude"
— sabrina (@strange_mercyy) ID: 10476420 20. And possibly to bring back custom ringtones. Those were fun. I want Kristen Stewart saying "I'm so gay dude" on a loop as my new ringtone
— ell (@ell_daviess) ID: 10476603 21. Basically: she’s soo gay, dude. I’m sooo gay, dude! We are a so gay, dude! (I mean, not all of us, but whatever.) View this image ›
Rich Polk ID: 10476486 22. The bottom line is: Kristen Stewart may have just saved 2017. View this image ›
Chaos / Chaos/Cosmo/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES ID: 10476487 23. PROCEED. ID: 10476646 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
